workflow.meta: 终止审核/终止协议流程（流经协同平台）

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: '请按照公司涉军项目管理要求，履行线下审批程序!'

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 10016",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key==0

result.display-name: 并购融资部及其下属团队发起

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 and id = 13929 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

result.display-name: 投资银行总部及其下属团队发起

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 and id = 10015 start with id = ?  connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
cnt1 == 1

step.name: 投资银行总部总经理审批

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},1)",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.ID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=13834 and roleid=6\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-流程已提交固收总经理审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 19 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS",O_WORKFLOW.ID,20,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

step.name: 质控三部主审、副审审核
投行质控总部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS",O_WORKFLOW.ID,O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID,$Login.User,'120000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
	true;
}else{
	false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select status from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg:
["begin
update jgcrm.os_wfentry t1
 set subject =
 (select t2.subject
 from jgcrm.os_wfentry t2
 where t2.id = (select t3.instid
 from ecif.lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS t3
 where t3.id = {0})) || '-请填写终止日期'
 where id =
 (select t4.instid from ecif.lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS t4 where t4.id = {0});
 commit;

end;",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.ID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"}]]

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 69 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_GS_CXXYSP",O_WORKFLOW.ID,70,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

step.name: 投行质控总部副总经理审批

dynOwner.describe: 投行_质控总部副总经理

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 1040 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS",O_WORKFLOW.ID,1041,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=10016 and roleid=138\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'--协议终止流程已提交内核办文管提交OA'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["UPDATE ECIF.TIB_XMXX SET SFRZZK=1,RZZKSJ = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) WHERE ID ={0} ",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.XMMC","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"}]]

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var xmid =O_WORKFLOW.XMMC;
var result=null;
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
result = bean.execute(1007, $Login.User.UserID,3,xmid);
var note=result.get('note');
var code=result.get('code');
true;

step.name: 内核办非权益类团队负责人审核
并购融资部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 1063 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_XYZZSPLC_GS",O_WORKFLOW.ID,1064,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},1)",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.ID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=13834 and roleid=6\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-流程已提交固收总经理审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]
